Html:
Hi,

Is there anyway to utilise / pass in a configuration section from another assemblies app.config? I have a base application which would have common configuration settings, but am loading another assembly which inherits from the base, but performs specific functions and hence would need specific configuration.

There will be multiple assemblies, each performing a different action. Kind of like a "plugin" type approach.

What I would like to do is define the generic configuration in the base assembly, but then define the specific configuration in the app.config of the plugin assembly.

Would this be possible?

Many thanks

Mark
